text: Alright Gabo, I picked up your cakes.
speaker: det

text: Very well. You see Young One, what happened was-
speaker: gabotop

text: WEATHER: CLOUDY, WITH PATCHES OF SUNLIGHT
speaker: gabotop

text: walked into our divine bakery with an aura of arrogance.
speaker: gabotop

text: They claimed that they were on some sort of a case, and demanded we grant them access to our selection of cakes under the pretense that it was found at the scene of a crime.
speaker: gabotop

text: I, and the great church of lord vrux'eok, try to keep a good relationship with the detective agencies and law enforcement so that they don't go looking into the other business-
speaker: gabotop

text: and as I was directing the sinner towards our breads, they used some sort of trickery or subterfuge to take my baked goods.
Somehow, as he was looking at the selection of desserts, they would be dragged into his stomach cavity.
speaker: gabotop

text: I thought it might be a denizen of Dertiza-5, but there weren't any pools of magma erupting from his stomach so it had to be something else.
Maybe an acolyte of the other sect of our church. Regardless-
speaker: gabotop

text: THE SUSPECT ATTEMPTED TO EXIT THE PREMISE.
AFTER [3] SECONDS, SUSPECT COLLAPSED AND FAILED TO EXIT.
speaker: gabotop

text: It seemed the interloper fell upon his own coat and landed upon one of the display tables.
speaker: gabotop

text: I tried to restrain him, but that foul soul threw my own holy bread towards me.
Before I knew it, he had managed to get away. I recall he stepped into some of my cream cakes.
speaker: gabotop

text: Yeah, I noticed. Our guy has some small feet.
speaker: det

text: Hm. I think I have an idea of where our culprit may be located. Thanks for the assistance Gabo, you've been a great help.
Say, maybe I'll pay your church a visit when this is all finished up, what do ya say?
speaker: det

text: That would be most copacetic! I hope to-
speaker: gabotop

text: OBSERVE YOU IN [1 - 5] HOURS WITH POSITIVE RESULTS.
speaker: gabotop
